biography.title: Biography
paragraphs: Hi, I'm Ihor, a software developer with a passion for building efficient, high-quality web applications and exploring the world of blockchain technology. With hands-on experience in React, Node.js, and blockchain development, I am dedicated to creating scalable, user-friendly solutions that drive value.

I believe that coding is more than just writing lines of code – it’s about solving real-world problems, building innovative solutions, and enhancing the user experience. Whether I’m working on a full-stack application, refining a UI, or exploring decentralized systems, I bring a commitment to excellence and a constant drive to improve.
I look forward to bringing my skills, passion, and creative problem-solving to your next project.

todo.description: This advanced Todo app is built with a React frontend, Express and Node.js backend, and PostgreSQL database using TypeORM. It includes authorization features such as registration, password reset, and password change. Todos can be public or private: public Todos are viewable by all without logging in, while private Todos are accessible only to their owner. The app is fully responsive with adaptive Todo views for different devices: infinite scroll on mobile, infinite slider on tablet, and table view on desktop. Users can add, edit, filter, and search Todos. For more details, visit the Todo app GitHub repository.

chat.description: This is a simple chat app developed as a quick solution to meet specific requirements within a time-constrained technical task for a company interview.
